Pre-Game Insights: La Albiceleste will begin their Copa America title defence after facing Ecuador and Guatemala in friendlies.
Argentina come into the upcoming 2024 Copa America as the defending champions, having won the competition in 2021.
Ecuador may find it difficult to get on the scoresheet against a dominant Argentinian defence.
They are placed in Group B along with Mexico, Venezuela and Jamaica.
This will be an exciting clash for sure.
The winner of their last meeting was Argentina.
The average number of goals in meetings between Argentina and Ecuador is 2.8.
Argentina are on a winning streak of three games.
